original_text: Each retry must verify the HMAC-SHA256 signature header to ensure authenticity before processing.
units: Each retry must verify the HMAC - SHA256 signature header to ensure authenticity before processing .

original_text: Additionally, the delivery process must meet an SLA of achieving successful delivery within 2 minutes at the 95th percentile (P95).
units: Additionally , the delivery process must meet an SLA of achieving successful delivery within 2 minutes at the 95th percentile ( P95 ) .
achieving successful delivery within 2 minutes at the 95th percentile ( P95 )
